title: Meta partners with news outlets to expand AI content
description: Meta announced Friday it will integrate content from major news organizations into its artificial intelligence assistant to provide Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp users with real-time information. The feature will allow users to access "more diverse content sources" and receive links to partner websites to dive deeper into stories, Meta said in a blog post.
content:

title: Ex-teacher indicted for possessing deepfake child pornography in Japan
description: NAGOYA, (Japan): A former male teacher in Nagoya was indicted Friday (Dec 5) for allegedly possessing sexually explicit images of young girls created using generative artificial intelligence based on real images of the children.
content:
NAGOYA, (Japan): A former male teacher in Nagoya was indicted Friday (Dec 5) for allegedly possessing sexually explicit images of young girls created using generative artificial intelligence based on real images of the children.

title: US top diplomat to visit Delhi, Bengaluru from Dec 7
description: Under Secretary Hooker's visit will focus on advancing the US-India strategic partnership, deepening economic and commercial ties including increasing American exports, and fostering collaboration in emerging technologies, including artificial intelligence and space exploration.
content:
Washington DC [US], December 7 (ANI): United States' Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs of the United States Allison Hooker will visit New Delhi and Bengaluru from December 7 to 11, a statement by the US Embassy said.
Under Secretary Hook... [2496 chars]

title: USCIS sets up new vetting center for enhanced security checks on foreign nationals
description: USCIS has established a new Vetting Center in Atlanta to enhance security screening of foreign nationals, aiming to identify potential threats to public safety and national security. This initiative centralizes enhanced vetting processes, utilizing advanced tools including artificial intelligence, to review immigration applications and safeguard the integrity of the U.S. immigration system.
content:

title: Apple rocked by executive departures, with chip chief at risk of leaving next
description: In just the past week, Apple’s heads of artificial intelligence and interface design stepped down. Then the company announced that its general counsel and head of governmental affairs were leaving as well. All four executives have reported directly to chief executive officer Tim Cook, marking an exceptional level of turnover in Apple’s C-suite.
content:

title: Apple shaken as executives, engineers step down; hardware technologies head likely to resign next

title: ByteDance’s agentic AI smartphone dials up a digital backlash from China’s top apps
description: ByteDance, the owner of TikTok, has moved to tighten controls on its artificial intelligence-powered smartphone after several of China’s most widely used apps
content:
ByteDance, the owner of TikTok, has moved to tighten controls on its artificial intelligence-powered smartphone after several of China’s most widely used apps restricted its voice-operated functions.

title: From Antarctica to AI: India International Science Festival 2025 brings science enthusiasts under one roof
description: The festival features over 150 technical and thematic sessions spanning science, technology, innovation, and industry. Key focus areas include artificial intelligence (AI), bio-economy, space, quantum technology, and the integration of traditional knowledge with modern science, alongside sessions on deep-tech entrepreneurship and the blue economy.
